    • HslCssValue

      public HslCssValue​(int h, float s, float l)
      Parameters:
      h - hue value. accepts values only from 0 to 360.
      s - saturation value. accepts values only from 0 to 100.
      l - lightness value. accepts values only from 0 to 100.
